page.title: 03A Child in Milton Ernest
page.content:
I did my piano examination on a Friday in Bedford. My tummy went all strange when my name was called. When I went in I felt even worse. A big fat cat was sitting on the carpet. I heard a bell. I went into a room where a very smiley lady told me to shut the door or else the cat would come in and jump on my back while I was playing. The piano was a grand piano and was much bigger than the piano we have at home. I played scales, broken chords and my pieces. I did some sight_reading and an aural test. When I came out the first thing I wanted was to get some fresh air. My mum said to me, "Do you think you did well?" I answered, "I don't know."
{This child is a girl aged 7 years at {Milton Ernest V.C. Lower School. }
